casebody.data:
Jeffrey STEPHENS, Appellant
v.
The PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, and State Correctional Institution at Dallas, Appellees No. 68 MAP 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Decided: June 1, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 1 st day of June, 2018, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
